item.title: Baked Beans
item.description: Adapted from Alton Brown’s recipe. Ingredients 3 cans great northern beans 3 cans black beans 1 onion, chopped 4 small jalapenos, seeded and chopped 1/2 cup tomato paste 1/2 cup dark brown sugar 1/4 cup molasses 3 cups vegetable broth 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper 2 teaspoon black pepper 1 teaspoon kosher salt Directions preheat oven to 250 degrees in a cast iron Dutch oven over medium heat, sweat onion and jalapenos to soften, about 5 minutes stir in the tomato paste, dark brown sugar, and molasses add the beans and vegetable broth and bring to a boil over high heat add in cayenne, black pepper and salt; stir and cover with the lid place the Dutch oven in the oven while preparing to smoke configure grill for indirect heat around 250 degrees add smoke wood and beans; smoke for 1 hour
